website_summaries.verdict: A quality 6-piece accessory set that makes it easy to expand the ways you can use your air fryer.
pros: Includes a cake pan, rack with 4 skewers, pizza pan, metal holder, silicone mat, and an egg bites mold
Designed to fit most air fryers
Rack can be used to increase air fryer's capacity
cons: Some buyers feel the accessories are too small for 5.8-quart air fryers

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service - Small for the 5.8 Qt Fryer
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE These accessories, in my opinion, are better suited for the smaller Air Fryer. They work in the 5.8 but they do not fit all the way to the edge as I would prefer. Following my review, the company contacted me directly explained the reason for the design stepped up refunding my money. Something that I did not request.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Way too small for 5.8qt
customer_reviews.text: I have the 5.8qt and this product was not designed for 5.8qt. It was designed for 5.3qt and obviously it will fit the 5.8qt as well since it’s larger. I bought this mostly for the rack so that I can cook multiple things at once. However the rack is not tall enough for you to really cook anything in the bottom area. Also since it’s significantly smaller than the full width and length of the 5.8qt, I ended up cooking less food than if I were to lay them without the rack. I wish they would just design the right accessories for 5.8qt instead of forcing people to downgrade their 5.8qt capacity to 5.3qt.
customer_reviews.author: hoyasilver

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Sorry to say that, but I’m disappointed. These accessories are a joke. I am interested in the ability to cook on 2 levels, hamburgers on the bottom and frys on the top level. None of these accessories will work. They are so small, too much space in between, and the frys fall out, and the legs are too short, so can’t be used as a 2nd level. Simply a failure. Please design a full size shelf, fitting the 5.8 size air fryer, then I will be happy. I do consider returning them.
customer_reviews.author: Just me

customer_reviews.title: Raised rack
customer_reviews.text: Their needs to be a raised rack so two items can be cooked at the same time. Ex. We had to cook frozen onion rings then cook our Frozen Perdue frozen Chicken tenders. A raised rack that fits the cooker basket correctly would have allowed us to cook these foods at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Lived up to the hype!
customer_reviews.text: I've heard a lot of people talking about Air Fryers so I was excited to get one. Only had it less than a week, but so far we've made fried pickles, wings, broccoli tots, "baked" potatoes, and pork chops! Everything has been great! Quick to cook. Easy to clean up after. The recipe book provides a ton of options! Also love the quick buttons for common food groups! So far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Katherine C.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Accessories for the Cosori air fryer!
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with the 3.7 Qt accessories for that same size air fryer, however I was disappointed that you only get the pizza pan and not both the pizza pan and cake pan. I’m a widow and making a small cake would be nice once in awhile. I’ve seen recipes for cakes in the air fryer, so, as I said I was disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Menger

customer_reviews.title: Great for crisp french fries
customer_reviews.text: I use it everyday cooking Ore-ida restaurant crisp french fries for the grandkids. The fries turn out better than McDonalds. My son-in-law loves his Cosori air fryer for chicken wings. Recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: rowdy pup

customer_reviews.title: Love these!!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my 5.8 Qt Cosori Air Fryer. I love the accessories! Great to use the rack when you have over flow of what you are making (like chicken or burgers) in the basket. You have to figure a way to get it in there with food in the bottom, but it will work. I saw other reviews that said these accessories are too small but they are not. If they were bigger they wouldn’t fit in the basket! And they can’t be made to go to the edges of the basket because the air needs to flow inside the basket hence the name “Air Fryer”. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very effective
customer_reviews.text: Pleased with several parts which I've tried so far. Grid raises food off bottom, so breaded items have improved air circulation all around versus lying flat on the bottom where some breading might stick. Kebabs are fun. Low cooking plate works for stuff like shrimp scampi, in which you can keep the shrimp in some garlicky oil for cooking. Haven't baked with the pot yet.
customer_reviews.author: Greg B

customer_reviews.title: Good, but wouldn’t order if I had it to do over
customer_reviews.text: Guess I didn’t think this through. Now where do I store all these small parts. That’s not their fault. My main issue is that the little blue egg or muffin silicone trays are TINY. Really tiny. I sort of expected them to be much bigger. Would rather have bigger capacity even if I can only make maybe 2,3, or 4 at a time. I understand all these parts need to be small in order to fit, like I said, I didn’t think this through. All this said, they arrived in a timely manner and are very well made, just kinda small.
customer_reviews.author: Macy

customer_reviews.title: Instruction booklet please.
customer_reviews.text: It would be helpful if there was an instruction booklet for the accessories. For example: how long do you cook eggs. Is the egg cooler used for cupcakes and muffins.
customer_reviews.author: Joe D

customer_reviews.title: Wooooo
customer_reviews.text: Cant wait to use them! The air fryer is amazing. Im very happy to have all these so I dont get the fryer itself dirty. Cupcake holders or whatever its for is so small and cute. Definitely mini muffin sized - holes are exactly 1 1/2 inches. Weeeeeeee. Cooking is fun again
customer_reviews.author: J0salgado

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: The entire product line was GREAT! The fryer is very quiet, and the accessories do exactly what we would like them to do, enhance the experience of cooking healthy meals. The clean up is a breeze and the food comes out great. The only downside is it does not serve the meal! LOL! (Or wash itself)
customer_reviews.author: V. Albarez

customer_reviews.title: Accessories are sized to fit the small fryer / Useless!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the larger model Cosori Air Fryer and added the accessories which are sized to fit the smaller 3+qt unit. The pans and especially the cupcake/muffin liners are bite size at best. Don't waste your time paying for this set.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looking forward to using all of these
customer_reviews.text: I have the 5.8QT Cosori Air Fryer. These accessories all fit nicely into the basket. I do wish the silicone mat was a bit larger though as it's the same size as the cake and pizza pans. I've used the skewers and rack so far. Looking forward to using the other accessories!
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: If this accessory kit is the best you can really do then don’t offer any assessories at all.
customer_reviews.text: I have returned these overpriced unused toys to Amazon. They reminded me very much of my daughters old easy bake oven. I do not want them. they are not good for much of anything. Your new a larger set appears to be a slight improvement but it is too expensive seems to contain slightly larger but still useless accessories. I am amazed that a company that puts such care Into the air fryer which I love, would release an accessory kit of such poor quality. You can do better.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. B

customer_reviews.title: ?forgot to say that customer service was 100% fast and friendly!!
customer_reviews.text: Really like the air fryer,use it probably 4 times a week. It is perfect size for 1 and possibly 2 as you can see in photo. Have also made meatloaf and chicken strips. Came out perfectly! Very well made and clean up is very easy. Would highly recommend this appliance to all. Would hate to be without it!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Dietsch

customer_reviews.title: love this air fryer
customer_reviews.text: I had a round air fryer previously and enjoyed using it. When I saw the Consori and read the reviews, I had to have it. What a great purchase. The square shape is wonderful, the preheat setting is wonderful. It is so easy to use and to clean. Love, love using it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It cooks so much faster than an oven
customer_reviews.text: Haven't NOT liked anything with it - yet. I bought it for my fiance', who loves to cook, for his birthday. He loves how it cooks faster. Also, the feature of it turning off when food is done is so much better than putting something in the oven and forgetting about it, and then it gets over cooked. And of course, the healthier cooking with less to no oil is a Plus! As for the accessories, we used the skewers and they work fine. We are just not so sure about the rubber muffin holder. Kinda worried that it might melt in the fryer....?
customer_reviews.author: Michele Sauro

customer_reviews.title: Increases utility of the air fryer! Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this package for the 5.8 at Cosori. It's directly from the manufacturer and has excellent packaging for the unboxing experience. The baking dish hold a lot of food. I've made potatoes au gratin, Mac and cheese, and a pasta bake. The pan is great for getting kind of a steamed fish effect. The racks are tricky for getting multiple layers of food so it's good that there's two. I haven't used the scewers yet. Bottom it expands the use of the machine.
customer_reviews.author: John G DC

customer_reviews.title: Nice addition 2 the Corsori Air Fryer
customer_reviews.text: Glad I added this to my air fryer purchase. Easy to clean and have used several accessories already and it’s good to have an extra wire rack in case I want to make more than one thing b4 washing everything. Glad I got this.
customer_reviews.author: SuzyQ4JC

customer_reviews.title: Nice variety of pieces
customer_reviews.text: There are so many different pieces that you can be creative in using one or two in the same cooking event. I have used a trivet on legs to give me more room to fry my chicken wings or anything else I want to make more of. Some of my Instant Pot accessories can be used with my air fryer, so that's convenient too!
customer_reviews.author: nativehoosier

customer_reviews.title: Not as useful or as practical as I had envisioned for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I was a little disappointed with these for the price. They were smaller then I was imagining. Racks felt lighter weight then I had imagined. Although what I was most disappointed with was the egg cups I was particularly excited about getting them, but with how small they are I don't know that I will get enough use out of them to justify the price. For the product you ended up getting it seems like it should be half the cost. I paid half of what I did on the fryer for something I'll probably hardly ever use. Maybe its designed for a smaller model then what I have? The COSORI Air Fryer 5.8 Quart, 1700 Watt
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Don't depend on the nonstick coating on the pans
customer_reviews.text: The nonstick coating on the pans is fine until it begins to flake off (three months or so after I bought the accessories). The coating is cheap, poorly designed, poorly engineered, and the project manager for the coating should resign. Waste of money to buy these accessories. Go to a kitchen store with measurements of the 5.8 qt basket and get quality pans instead.
customer_reviews.author: Frederick

customer_reviews.title: Really useful accessories
customer_reviews.text: I have just started using these. The silicone mat is very useful - one of those items I didn't know I needed and now I could not do without it. I have also used the plain rack - I put broccoli below and salmon on the rack. It worked perfectly. Not sure if I will do cake and pizza - maybe. The egg bites silicone tray will be really useful. I want to see if I can find a recipe for the Starbucks eggbites.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love them all!
customer_reviews.text: Love these. I use it for my 5.8 Cosori Air Fryer. My favorite one being the cake pan because you can make an entire cake or banana bread in it. It doesn't stick and slides right out if you would like to. I've used almost all of the accessories and adore my air fryer. These assesories makes cooking meals easier and the cleanup for your actual air fryer much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Bullock

customer_reviews.title: Pay attention to measurements.
customer_reviews.text: Only one item doesn’t fit in my ninja foodie but I knew the risk. Make sure to read the measurements. Everything I can use has been really good so far. I love the steamer and the egg holder. The kits have been life savers and extra cooking utensils is never a bad thing in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Ebony

customer_reviews.title: Just received - not used yet.
customer_reviews.text: We like the assortment of accessories your new and first air fryer, but there were not instructions on how to specifically use each especially the egg bite maker. I will order a Cosori cookbook , maybe it will have a list of how to these accessories. We look forward to using them.
customer_reviews.author: David J. Moday

customer_reviews.title: Great accessories
customer_reviews.text: These are a great set of accessories to use with an air fryer. I just used the pizza pan. I cooked a sweet potato most of the way, then put kielbasa, sauerkraut, and Brussel sprouts with bacon on the pan with the sweet potato. Turned out great! I experimented making mini cake bites with the egg mold. I think cleaning the accessories will be easier than having to clean the basket as much.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: The cake pan, pizza pan and rack I'm sure I'll use... I'm not a fan of kabobs, the egg mold is ridiculously small and useless and the silicone mat isn't necessary...not worth almost $32...you really don't need many accessories to use the air fryer
customer_reviews.author: Happy Animal

customer_reviews.title: Not Sure I'll Ever Use Most of These
customer_reviews.text: I really like the 7" pans (the pizza pan and the "cake" pan). I use those all the time. I still haven't used the silicon pieces OR the racks, however, I'd like to step up with my cooking creativity, and then I think i may use all these. However, tonight I'm ordering a 7" cake pan from Amazon , because i use the 7 " pan so much... even though that's not made for an air fryer, I'm sure it will work.
customer_reviews.author: L.B.Redd

customer_reviews.title: Small but great tools!
customer_reviews.text: Still working out how a lot of my fryer, and the accessories, work. But the cake pan is awesome, and the grill is excellent for meat.
customer_reviews.author: lucylu

customer_reviews.title: The most Amazing Air Fryer you can buy today
customer_reviews.text: Wow this Air Fryer is AMAZING and has exceeded my expectations in every way. So far the chicken I made was INCREDIBLE and I can’t wait to try everything with it. I love the pre-heating feature and think Cosori is the Best Air Fryer you can purchase. I have been raving about this to everyone and know you’ll enjoy it as much as I am.
customer_reviews.author: Fran

customer_reviews.title: Loving my air fryer....
customer_reviews.text: So far I really like my air fryer. I haven't used it a lot, done chicken, steaks and fish in it. But love the way it cooks. No smell in the house and so very little oil used. Going to try chicken wings next. Clean up is a breeze, no complaints at all. We will see what the future holds for this. The only reason I gave it a 4 is I haven't had it long enough to give it a 5.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Malcott

customer_reviews.title: Ease of preparation and fast cooking times !!!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love it. I'm living a ketogenic lifestyle and live the ease of cooking my meals. Our rib eye steak was perfect...french fries, jicama fries, chicken wings, breasts and all have made my life so easy. Everything is moist and juicy. Have a keto air fryer cookbook is awesome too. With just two of us now, the 3.7 fryer is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Sher

customer_reviews.title: Could be perfect if not for machine taste/smell.
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint is the machine smell and the taste of the machine on the food. I've been using it semi regularly for over a month now and the machine taste seems to be lessening but is not completely gone. Hoping with a few more uses it wont have that smell/taste anymore. Otherwise it cooks/crisps well. Chicken and bacon are great but I usually have to cook longer than the recipe suggests.
customer_reviews.author: namzov

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: There were no instructions on how to use any of the accessories!! I realized the accessories I bought didn’t go with the air fryer I had purchased. The customer service team at Cosori have been very helpful!!! Wish I had bought their fryer!!’
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Howard

customer_reviews.title: Opens up more options for the airfryer
customer_reviews.text: Like my headline says, this allows you more options when cooking things in your air fryer. Highly recommend. -Unrelated but something I stumbled upon... use tinfoil to line the bottom of your air fryer when cooking. Most of the time I never even need to wash it when I'm done cooking :)
customer_reviews.author: adam behrends

customer_reviews.title: Great Addition to my Air Fryer
customer_reviews.text: I bought the accessories at the same time that I bought the Air Fryer. I'm glad that I did. I love the Air Fryer and all the accessories. It was a great buying experience. Everything was delivered on time and packaged well.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Powers, author

customer_reviews.title: Perfect accompaniment to my Cosori
customer_reviews.text: If you have a Cosori Air Fryer, you need these pieces! The only things I have not used, yet are the skewers. Good price. Clean easily and easy to use. And easy to store as everything fits together!
customer_reviews.author: APClark

customer_reviews.title: Logical (Air Fryer) Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I like each accessory piece, my only issue so far is getting the Hot Pan out of basket. I haven't tried the cup cake/muffin piece but the others are well made, and correct size. Im a satisfied customer..
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Jay

customer_reviews.title: Gotta have these!
customer_reviews.text: Having more fun with our Cosori air fryer now than ever with this addition of utensils! Baked cornbread in 11 mins last night to go with our Instant Pot chili. We may never use our stove/oven again:)
customer_reviews.author: MikeL

customer_reviews.title: Seems liked used product
customer_reviews.text: Received the product. Disappointed! The lid of the muffin’s pan is all marked with words , seems like someone have used the pan before. I don’t expect to buy a used product !
customer_reviews.author: Chung Kin Ling

customer_reviews.title: Gave as gift
customer_reviews.text: I liked the features of this air fryer compared to the one I have. When it is time to replace mine, I will purchase this one. Waiting to hear from the person I gave this air fryer to so I can see what they think as this is the first one she has had. I also purchased extra accessories.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne Stapledon

customer_reviews.title: Not Designed for 5.8 Air Fryer but Useful.
customer_reviews.text: These accessories are smaller than the dimensions of a 5.8 air fryer but are useable. It is tight to get two pork chop on the rack. The Egg/ muffin cups are so small as to be useless.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Hatchett

customer_reviews.title: Would Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Product seems OK. Fits in fryer OK, does not seem small like some reviews. Only cleaned them after opening box. Have not use them yet. Money wise alittle high.
customer_reviews.author: BK

customer_reviews.title: Love This Machine
customer_reviews.text: I am not one who enjoys cooking but this machine makes it a lot more fun. My hubs and I have had the most fun experimenting with different recipes etc. and so far so good. I especially like how easy this machine is to operate. No guess work involved.
customer_reviews.author: somebodyintexas

customer_reviews.title: Just what's needed
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had opportunity to use all of the tools but so far they have worked as designed. I am glad they are not stainless steel. Heat does not appear to to cause them to lose the designed designed shape. I don't cook three meals per day, it may take time for me to use all.
customer_reviews.author: WLR

customer_reviews.title: Size
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately this doesn't fit into my fryer. I am in the process of returning
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: use this set all the time
customer_reviews.text: i love the versatility, can pretty much make anything airfried with this set it seems lol. go on have some fun fast shipping good packaging
customer_reviews.author: Wildlettermath

customer_reviews.title: Does its job
customer_reviews.text: A simple set of accessories that does its job. I use it mostly for the little pot, to make keto stews. Looking forward to using the little skewers and holder. Seems to be well made. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Pitlog

customer_reviews.title: Items good except egg bite dish pretty small
customer_reviews.text: Blue baking dish is very small, great if you do mini muffins or egg bites but not much else. I thought they would be larger. Everything else has worked well
customer_reviews.author: Lizzybe

customer_reviews.title: Noise Level
customer_reviews.text: I have had the air fryer for two weeks and have thoroughly enjoyed it. I have not had a chance to try out any of the recipes that came with it -- but am looking forward to doing so. The noise level is still very high. I had expected it to be a bit quieter.
customer_reviews.author: dhv

customer_reviews.title: Great so far
customer_reviews.text: I have not used all of these pans yet but I used the pizza pan for making my son a small portion of apple dump cake in my air fryer. It turned out to be just the perfect size and clean up in the dishwasher was a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very useful
customer_reviews.text: I use everything except for the egg pan. It's tricky fitting the cake pan in, you have to turn it just right. The rest are very useful.
customer_reviews.author: Silvergriffin

customer_reviews.title: Nice For Fryer
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to use with my Cosori fryer. I haven't used all the units, but what I have used works well, and I have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: GJ

customer_reviews.title: Why so expensive
customer_reviews.text: All I needed was the grates so that i could suspend stuff in the air while in the air fryer. Why is this so expensive? Who the heck is making cakes in there air FRYER.
customer_reviews.author: E. Lorenzi

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I like the ease of use. Easy to clean. Makes fixing dinner a breeze. Would have liked more recipes in the booklet but I found a great air fryer cookbook that I haven't even needed yet because the air fryer is so easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: T. Kay Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! This is my second air fryer. I traded my first one in for this one because this is larger. Works great. The chicken wings were crispy and fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald P. Zanoni

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice-looking set but really found I don't use that many of the pieces .It seemed like they were a little pricey for what they do. The quality is good and they just pop in the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: ANN M.

customer_reviews.title: The right tool for the right job
customer_reviews.text: The accessories are very helpful as I have a set of tools designed to be used with my cosori airfryer. We have not used them all yet but the ones we have used are very good
customer_reviews.author: carlos rosa

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: The air fryer is a great new addition to our kitchen. It was easy use and clean. I look forward to using it again
customer_reviews.author: Drew Fried

customer_reviews.title: Good quality stuff, but pricey.
customer_reviews.text: I bought for the pans and racks. Not much interested in the silicone stuff. The set is about $5 over-priced.
customer_reviews.author: chas

customer_reviews.title: Useful
customer_reviews.text: Easy to clean , useful and dishwasher is ok Grill parts are really useful because it’s helps to cook underneath the food
customer_reviews.author: Cagdas

customer_reviews.title: Very nice to have for baking or making to items at once. Easy to clean.
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used all of them but the ones I've used are used for pizza and casseroles. The racks I used to cook a chicken and potatoes together at the same time. They are great!
customer_reviews.author: Leticia Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Each accessory was a great addition to this air fryer.
customer_reviews.text: I want to use my Cosori air fryer so adding these accessories were a major plus. I would encourage everyone to purchase these accessories to make this air fryer a real success.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: great set!!
customer_reviews.text: Appreciate these accessories, esp the little egg holders, and the cake pan and it worked great for pizza!
customer_reviews.author: skr

customer_reviews.title: a must have
customer_reviews.text: it just simply completes your air fryer. and allows it to do all the things its able to do. dont hesitate get them.
customer_reviews.author: michael cano

customer_reviews.title: Adds Function to the Air Fryer
customer_reviews.text: These accessories make an air fryer even more useful. Bake a cake or a pizza ... skewer hot dogs or sausages ... cook at two levels. These products are a necessity for the avid cook.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Greensmith

customer_reviews.title: Great complementary set!
customer_reviews.text: My wife says our air fryer is like the "easy bake oven" for adults. We use the baking pan the most for pizza but all the complementary pans offer versatility and ease for cooking.
customer_reviews.author: Travis J. Rian

customer_reviews.title: Really nice.
customer_reviews.text: This air fryer is a great convenience. Since it operates on completely different cooking principles than cooking in your oven, you sort of need to learn how to cook all over again. So, I recommend loading up on air fryer cookbooks in order to take full advantage of this really great air fryer.
customer_reviews.author: James L. Nammack

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a gift for my dad - he's been using the air fryer so much I knew he'd appreciate these accessories - they fit perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: Great Accessories
customer_reviews.text: Love the accessories haven't used them all but what we have it's been great. And clean up is a BREEZE
customer_reviews.author: TZ

customer_reviews.title: Dual Purpose Accessories
customer_reviews.text: I like the accessories for my Air-fryer and my Instant Pot. The silicone egg tray is wonderful. No oil is necessary to pop the eggs out. The pot with the handle is so very handy and makes clean up easy for both appliances.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Kimberly Gordacan

customer_reviews.title: Great Usefule Set!
customer_reviews.text: I love this set - I used the “cake pan” to make frozen Trader Joe’s cauliflower rice and it worked perfectly! It usually makes a huge mess on my stove! The pan rest is great to have, I keep it in front of the Cosori air fryer and set the basket on it when I pull it out to check something. Very handy.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: easy To use.
customer_reviews.text: Need to explain the use of parchment paper for baking. I wanted to make muffins. There’s no muffin like pan the bites container is to small I noticed some of the other companies have muffin cups or ramikans. I finally bake my brownies on parchment paper and they turned out fine. I am able to improvise. Other than that problem I love my air fryer but wish the accessories were a litt.le larger the accessories need some explanation on how to use.them and when to use the racks.
customer_reviews.author: Eleanore Gene Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Just what you need!
customer_reviews.text: A must have....if you want to expand your creativity when cooking with an Air Fryer.
customer_reviews.author: C. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: YES YES YES...buy this and the Corsi air fryer and have some fun
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this kit and the flexibility it offers with my Corsi fryer. One of the best purchases ever.
customer_reviews.author: Straight-Talk

customer_reviews.title: Very Handy!
customer_reviews.text: I use the fryer 5 or 6 times a week and use the accessories some of those times. They work great in the air fryer and fit perfectly. Glad I bought them.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs C

customer_reviews.title: Work perfect in my 5.8 quart Cosori air fryer👍
customer_reviews.text: I have a 5.8 quart Cosori air fryer and these accessories work perfect in it.. very few recipes that one of these does not work great with!
customer_reviews.author: CarlaT

customer_reviews.title: Great air fryer!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my air fryer. It’s a time saver and easy to use and easy to clean up. The accessory pack makes it even better. I love fish sticks, chicken tenders, etc. done in the air fryer.
customer_reviews.author: Navyretired

customer_reviews.title: Air bake
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact that I can use these to increase the use of my air fryer. They are easy to use and clean. So happy that I purchased this!
customer_reviews.author: Angela Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Must have.
customer_reviews.text: Great add on to the air fryer. Everything works great especially the egg holders. Baking cookies in there works super well.
customer_reviews.author: William Loseke

customer_reviews.title: Not really a big help.
customer_reviews.text: These could be handy if you are cooking for 1 person. There were no instructions on how to use these in the air fryer therefore not likely to use all of them.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Enables more versatility for the air fryer!
customer_reviews.text: Great accessories for the Cosori Air Fryer! Makes the air fryer more versatile!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice air fryer set
customer_reviews.text: I use the pizza pan all the time. Biscuits, chicken nugets
customer_reviews.author: FlHonda

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: The push button controls on front are real finicky. I don't think they will operate for very long I already have to push on them two or three times sometimes to get them to work.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: I cant rate this item as I gave it as a Christmas present
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Knudsen

customer_reviews.title: Corsori Air Fryer
customer_reviews.text: I have used the Cosori Air Fryer several times and am very pleased with how it cooks and have not been disappointed at all. Clean up is simple and fast. Know I will continue to use it. I replaced my Counter top oven with this. As always Cosori makes a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: lots of kitchen space
customer_reviews.text: using the shallow pan the most maybe include a pan lifter
customer_reviews.author: Keith L Perushek

customer_reviews.title: Nice accessory kit when ordering the 5.6 qt Cosori fryer
customer_reviews.text: Nice to have with the amazing Cosori air fryer. Uses are endless especially for the cake/soup pan. I am so glad I ordered this when ordering the fryer!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer L Jones

customer_reviews.title: Complete set.
customer_reviews.text: Lots of options, good addition to the air fryer the size is perfect. It helps me cook some more and learn more stuffs to cook.
customer_reviews.author: Mark G

customer_reviews.title: Great Investment
customer_reviews.text: We purchased these to go with the air fryer and they have helped a lot. We’re able to get more creative with our meals.
customer_reviews.author: Jonetta Prendergast

customer_reviews.title: It works as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: So far this thing works really well. My wife loves it the way it cooks foods with air.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Used Once Love It
customer_reviews.text: I have used my air fryer once with the accessories I purchased and the meal was wonderful, the pans and racks helped with the dinner and we are hooked
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Way too much money for this set.
customer_reviews.text: The size of these products are really small and probably not very useful.
customer_reviews.author: readtaupe

customer_reviews.title: Simplify with Silicone
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift. They were so excited to try them out .
customer_reviews.author: Melody Barry

customer_reviews.title: Perfect set
customer_reviews.text: It was shipped on time and will go well with the air-fryer which was built well.
customer_reviews.author: s.mccoy

customer_reviews.title: Useful equipment for air fryer
customer_reviews.text: All the extra equipment should work well with the air fryer for adding features with baking frying and cooking other other Foods so I haven't had a chance to use any of this stuff but in the future I'm sure I will use it all at one time or the other so I say it's well worth the investment for the extra equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great non stick
customer_reviews.text: only used the round pan so far but love the capacity and non stick feature. Mac and Cheese was wonderful and easy clean up
customer_reviews.author: KAREN

product_meta.title: COSORI Air Fryer Accessories XL (C158-6AC), Set of 6 Fit all 5.8Qt, 6Qt Air Fryer, FDA Compliant, BPA Free, Dishwasher Safe, Nonstick Coating
product_meta.description: Size:5.8QT| Style Name:Air FryerCook more than ever before with the 6 Piece Cosori Air Fryer Accessory Set! Air Fryer Accessory Set Includes: 1 x Cake Pan; 1 x Pizza Pan; 1 x Metal Holder; 1 x Multi-Purpose Rack with Skewers; 1 x Silicone Mat; 1 x Egg Bites Mold with Lid
feature_bullets: FDA Compliant & BPA free - Made of healthy and safe food grade and heat-resisting materials, our accessories are FDA Compliant and BPA free, no worry about any hazardous chemicals, enjoy funny and healthy cooking.

6 pcs accessory kit - Includes 1 x cake pan; 1 x pizza pan; 1 x metal holder; 1 x multi-purpose rack with 5 skewers; 1 x Silicone Mat; and 1 x egg bites mold with lid. Everything you need to cook without costing you more time and money to buy each piece individually.
Scope of application - Perfect for COSORI 5. 8Qt air fryer, also fit for larger air fryers, applicable for Gowise USA, Philips, Ninja, Instant Pot and most brands of air fryer.

Enjoy Bonus Accessories - Cook cakes, pizzas, eggs, skewered foods, and more! Included accessories (Egg Bites Mold, Cake Pan, Pizza Pan, Metal Holder, Rack & Skewers, Silicone Mat) expand what you can make and even increase your cooking area in the air fryer.

What is it for? - These air fryer accessories are perfect for making french fries, onion rings, chicken strips, roast vegetables, pizzas, cookies, biscuits, fish, mozzarella sticks, pork, corn dogs, prawns, broccoli and many others with better taste.
Dishwasher safe - All of our accessories are dishwasher safe. Nonstick coating pans, metal rack and heat-resistant mat & mold, which are durable and easy to clean.
